nodes.text: Tellar was a commentator on Gundark's Gear Datalog during the early years of the New Republic. On the entry for the DL-6H heavy blaster pistol, Tellar informed others that a weapons tech last seen at Margath's on Elshandruu Pica was offering to modify the weapon's power cell housing to give it twenty extra shots. Tellar once rigged up a speartip with detonite tape and fired it from a Firearc49 Speargun; the projectile blasted through the armored fortress gate of an underwater garrison
